attributes.action: Stop the increase of energy supplies and nationalize a UK energy company.
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK can't afford another energy price rise. The cost of living surpasses our income, the energy prices along with the fuel price increase is crippling our society. Winter is coming and it is going to be a case of heat or eat for families across the UK. It's is going to effect our elderly and vulnerable households especially with no doubt the increase in deaths due to not being able to afford to heat theri home. The mental impact this is going to have-and is already happening-is going to be through the roof- just like the ridiculous prices. We need to put a stop to this now.
attributes.background: Stop the increase in the energy supplies and nationalize one UK energy company.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean when you say you want the Government to "Stop the increase in the energy supplies".

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Nationalise energy companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
